Header: One More Meditation Session Conducted For Tri-Service Personnel
Content: Directorate of Psychological Operations-organized one more spiritual healing meditation programme took place at Bavunseth Manasika Suwasewana Vipassana Meditation Centre at Kanduboda. 9 Lady Officers, 66 woman soldiers, 4 Officers and 14 sailors of the Navy practised meditation sessions. Ven. Diyasenpura Vimala Thero conducted mediation sessions.
